Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

826.23 APPEALS AND FEES.

​(a) Any written decision by the City Manager, or his designee under Section826.22(c).

(Ord. 03-42. Passed 8-21-03.)

​(b) Applications for appeal shall bear the current fee set forth in Appendix A of Chapter 1464 of the Codified Ordinances, refundable if the appeal is granted in its entirety.

(Ord. 02-55. Passed 11-7-02; Ord. 03-42. Passed 8-21-03.)
